This repository collects ideas  on the project *Activity-driven enhancement of complex fluids*.

It uses [quarto](https://www.quarto.org) to build the notes,





### Aims

Use this to:

- do some brainstorming
- track your progress
- share useful links


## Main sections

- The [Log](log.qmd) contains a diary 
- The [Links](links.qmd) contains a list of useful resources
- The [Tasks](tasks.qmd) contains a checklist of things to do
